title: After They Say Yes
objective: Lock in trust and momentum after commitment by guiding the guest through next steps with clarity, celebration, and zero surprises—so they feel confident, cared for, and excited to take delivery.
learning_outcomes: Confirm commitment cleanly and reduce buyer’s remorse risk immediately.
Set a calm, confident roadmap of what happens next (no confusion, no drift).
Protect trust by introducing team handoffs and timing expectations properly.
Maintain momentum during paperwork/finance transition with permission-based language.
Keep the guest emotionally positive with simple celebration and reassurance.
Capture clean notes and align internal team steps to avoid re-work and surprises.
